Package Description

    Methods in com.epf.RentManager.controler with parameters of type CliControler 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private static void CliControler.addClient​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to enter parameters and then creates a new Client object in the database
    private static void CliControler.addReservation​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to enter parameters and then creates a new Reservation object in the database
    private static void CliControler.addVehicle​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to enter parameters and then creates a new Vehicle object in the database
    private static void CliControler.deleteAssociatedReservations​(CliControler cli, Client clientToDelete)
    function that gets all the reservations associated to a Client and then delete them in the database
    private static void CliControler.deleteAssociatedReservations​(CliControler cli, Vehicle vehicleToDelete)
    function that gets all the reservations associated to a Vehicle and then delete them in the database
    private static void CliControler.deleteClient​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to enter one Client object's ID and then delete the associated Client in the database
    private static void CliControler.deleteReservation​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to enter one reservation object's ID and then delete the associated Reservation in the database
    private static void CliControler.deleteVehicle​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to enter one Vehicle object's ID and then delete the associated Vehicle in the database
    private static void CliControler.editClient​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to choose a Client by its ID, to enter new parameters and then edit an existing Client object in the database
    private static void CliControler.editReservation​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to choose a Reservation by its ID, to enter new parameters and then edit an existing Reservation object in the database
    private static Reservation CliControler.editReservationProperties​(CliControler cli, Reservation reservationToEdit, java.lang.String vehicle, java.lang.String client, java.lang.String beginning, java.lang.String end)
    function that checks if all paramaters have been filled and if not, fill them by the old parameters of the Reservation
    private static void CliControler.editVehicle​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user to choose a Vehicle by its ID, to enter new parameters and then edits an existing Vehicle object in the database
    private static void CliControler.findClient​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that gets the ID of a Client and prints it if it exists in the database
    private static void CliControler.findClientsByVehicle​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user a vehicle and them prints all the associated clients
    private static void CliControler.findResaByClientId​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that gets the ID of a Client and prints all the associated reservations if they exist in the database
    private static void CliControler.findResaByVehicleId​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that gets the ID of a Vehicle and prints all the associated reservations if they exist in the database
    private static void CliControler.findReservation​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that gets the ID of a Reservation and prints it if it exists in the database
    private static void CliControler.findVehicle​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that gets the ID of a Vehicle and prints it if it exists in the database
    private static void CliControler.findVehiclesByClient​(CliControler cli, java.util.Scanner sc)
    function that asks the user a client and them prints all the associated vehicles

    function that prints all the Client objects in the database

    function that prints all the Reservation objects in the database
